SEARCH

Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.util.delayedinput

@NonNullByDefault package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.util.delayedinput
This package contains classes and interfaces related to handling and processing delayed input requests. The DelayedInputRequest class represents a single delayed input request, such as a request to a player to input a name or confirmation for a command.

The DelayedStructureSpecificationInputRequest class is a subclass of DelayedInputRequest that is specifically designed for handling requests to specify a structure to operate on when more than one structure fits a given identifier. For example when a user tries to change a structure named "MyDoor", but there are 2 structures with that name.
